div.head: CANTON - page 2
div.p: Canton representative that contents above twobldgs. being stored their godown against charge approximately H.K. $1,000 per month.

4/5/50 - OM to Hong Kong 4/5/50 - Auth. granted to transfer to Dept. files of CONGEN at Canton. Send allfiles if possible by military transportation. If no military transportation, ship unclassified files via steamer and hold classified material untilarrangements can be made to ship via courier pouch,
3/30/50- London despatch #1560, 3/30/50 - Arrangments by British godown.
7/17/50- OM from Taipei - Finance & personnel records from Canton forwarded to Dept.

8/31/79 - ConGen at Guangzhou (formerly Canton) officially opened (State 255794 of 9/28/79). Principal Officer: FSO-3 Richard L. Williams. Consular District consists of Guangdong Province and the Guangxi Autonomous Region.
